create table Alunos ( id int4 not null, Aniversario date, E-mail varchar(255), Endereço varchar(255), Nome varchar(255), Telefone varchar(255), DataPgto int4, datainicio date, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table Contratos ( id int4 not null, FormaPgto varchar(255) not null, dataInicio date not null, valorDesconto float8 not null, itens_id int4, aluno_id int4 not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table FolhaPgmt ( id int4 not null, Data_Pgto timestamp, Valor_a_Receber float8, Professores int4, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table ItensContr ( idContrato int4 not null, pacote_id int4 not null, primary key (idContrato) ) Hibernate:
create table modalidades ( id int4 not null, Descrição varchar(155) not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table Pacotes ( id int4 not null, descricao varchar(120) not null, valor float8 not null, modalidades_id int4, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table Pagamento ( id int4 not null, Data_Pagamento timestamp, dataVcto timestamp not null, Valor float8, Valor_Pagamento decimal(12,2), contratos int4 not null, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table Professores ( id int4 not null, Aniversario date, E-mail varchar(255), Endereço varchar(255), Nome varchar(255), Telefone varchar(255), Data_Admissão date, data_aniver date, primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table Professores_FolhaPgmt ( Professores_id int4 not null, F_pagamento_id int4 not null ) Hibernate:
create table Professores_modalidades ( Professores_id int4 not null, modalidade_id int4 not null ) Hibernate:
alter table Professores_FolhaPgmt add constraint UK_khl6hvliwe7mmv0u8p7ft1rkh unique (F_pagamento_id) Hibernate:
alter table Contratos add constraint FKrt0o8lv2yoy5h15qcsymkbpgo foreign key (itens_id) references ItensContr Hibernate:
alter table Contratos add constraint FK7ijee99npsulfodg10d9699x foreign key (aluno_id) references Alunos Hibernate:
alter table FolhaPgmt add constraint FKtkkw8ksbgctbji2v945hoh3b9 foreign key (Professores) references Professores Hibernate:
alter table ItensContr add constraint FKn3q9i6v3x9slu8vcfxr6nnakl foreign key (pacote_id) references Pacotes Hibernate:
alter table Pacotes add constraint FKkfw7l8lsbsbujqgnh6od19xhx foreign key (modalidades_id) references modalidades Hibernate:
alter table Pagamento add constraint FK19hy9t8b4a2snwiyggt0dl9hm foreign key (contratos) references Contratos Hibernate:
alter table Professores_FolhaPgmt add constraint FKeky9q52krdd5c38bo718ln3ur foreign key (F_pagamento_id) references FolhaPgmt Hibernate:
